mapper.insert: insert into tbl_file(file_original_name, file_uuid, file_path, file_size, board_id) values(#{fileOriginalName}, #{fileUuid}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{boardId})
mapper.select: select file_id, file_original_name, file_uuid, file_path, file_size, board_id from tbl_file where board_id = #{boardId}
select file_id, file_original_name, file_uuid, file_path, file_size, board_id from tbl_file where file_path = date_format(current_timestamp() - interval 1 day, '%Y/%m/%d')
